admission_process: Apply online with the required documents. Shortlisted candidates will be invited for an entrance exam and interview.

sports_categories.description: Soccer is one of the most popular sports at University of XYZ. Students participate in friendly matches, intramural leagues, and intercollegiate competitions.
Basketball enthusiasts can join the college team or play casual games at the campus courts. Regular tournaments are organized to promote healthy competition.
The college has a well-equipped swimming pool where students can enjoy recreational swimming and compete in swimming events.
For those who love athletics, track and field events provide an opportunity to showcase their speed, endurance, and strength in various disciplines.

admission_process: Submit an online application with necessary documents. Applicants may need to take a standardized test or an entrance exam, followed by an interview.

sports_categories.description: Tennis enthusiasts can enjoy playing singles and doubles matches. The college hosts tennis tournaments, encouraging friendly competition.
Volleyball is a popular sport at ABC College. Students can join the volleyball team or play casual games on the campus courts.
Badminton courts are available for students to play and enjoy this fast-paced racquet sport.
Table Tennis facilities are provided for students who enjoy the fast and competitive nature of the sport.

admission_process: Complete the online application and submit required documents. Admission may be based on academic records, test scores, and an interview.

sports_categories.description: Cricket is a popular sport at PQR Institute, with regular matches and tournaments held on the college campus.
Rugby enthusiasts can join the college team and participate in intercollege competitions, showcasing their strength and teamwork.
Baseball facilities are available for students who enjoy this bat-and-ball game. Friendly matches and competitions are organized regularly.
Golf enthusiasts can practice their swing and putting skills at the college's golf course, enjoying the serene and challenging environment.
